title: How to Draw a Bottlenose Dolphin

steps.headline: Draw the basic shapes for our basis of the body.
Draw a curvy triangle for the dorsal fin and flippers.
steps.description: Add in the tail and the beak.

steps.headline: Add details like the eyes, mouth and blowhole.
Outline your dolphin and erase guidelines.
Color it.
steps.description: Keep the underbelly lighter  than the back

text: Draw the basic shapes for our basis of the body. This will look like 3 ovals. Draw a curvy triangle for the dorsal fin and flippers. Add in the tail and the beak. Add details like the eyes, mouth and blowhole.  Outline your dolphin and erase guidelines.  Color it. Keep the underbelly lighter  than the back
